content: Insurance Asked by Desmond ChikAsked on 10 Aug 2019There are many early stage critical illness in the market nowadays. Is it possible for Seedly to conduct a research on this and share your opinion? Thank you.?I am looking to purchase an early stage CI. However, I just found out that there are quite a few with different features e.g. number of illness, how early the stage is, multiple claims for same illness and/or different illness, etc. In addition, I am not really able to determine whether I need one early stage CI although I "feel" that it would be good to have before I retire.Hence, it would be great if you are able to share your opinion.
